languages.text: "И хорошо. Значит, мои товарищи хотя бы не зря головы сложили... благодаря им — и вам — больше ребята в засады попадать не будут!"
"Good. That means at least my comrades didn't die for nothing... There won't be any more ambushes thanks to them — and you!"
languages.original_text: "И хорошо. Значит, мои товарищи хотя бы не зря головы сложили... благодаря им — и вам — больше ребята в засады попадать не будут!"

traits.locale_text: "Good. That means at least my comrades didn't die for nothing... There won't be any more ambushes thanks to them — and you!"
"Good. That means at least my comrades didn't die for nothing... There won't be any more ambushes thanks to them — and you!"
"Good. That means at least my comrades didn't die for nothing... There won't be any more ambushes thanks to them — and you!"
"Good. That means at least my comrades didn't die for nothing... There won't be any more ambushes thanks to them — and you!"
"Good. That means at least my comrades didn't die for nothing... There won't be any more ambushes thanks to them — and you!"
"Good. That means at least my comrades didn't die for nothing... There won't be any more ambushes thanks to them — and you!"

languages.text: "Gut. Dann sind meine Kameraden zumindest nicht umsonst gestorben ... Dank ihnen wird es keine Hinterhalte mehr geben — und dank Euch!"
languages.original_text: "Good. That means at least my comrades didn't die for nothing... There won't be any more ambushes thanks to them — and you!"

traits.locale_text: "Gut. Dann sind meine Kameraden zumindest nicht umsonst gestorben ... Dank ihnen wird es keine Hinterhalte mehr geben — und dank Euch!"

languages.text: « Bien. Au moins, mes camarades ne seront pas morts pour rien... Il n'y aura plus d'embuscades grâce à eux, et aussi grâce à vous ! »
languages.original_text: "Good. That means at least my comrades didn't die for nothing... There won't be any more ambushes thanks to them — and you!"

traits.locale_text: « Bien. Au moins, mes camarades ne seront pas morts pour rien... Il n'y aura plus d'embuscades grâce à eux, et aussi grâce à vous ! »

languages.text: “太好了，至少我的战友们没有白白牺牲……我们再也不会遭到伏击了。多亏了他们，还有您！”
languages.original_text: "Good. That means at least my comrades didn't die for nothing... There won't be any more ambushes thanks to them — and you!"

traits.locale_text: “太好了，至少我的战友们没有白白牺牲……我们再也不会遭到伏击了。多亏了他们，还有您！”

languages.text: 「よかった。少なくとも私の仲間は無駄死にしなかったということだ。もう待ち伏せされることはないでしょう。彼らと…そして、あなたのおかげで！」
languages.original_text: "Good. That means at least my comrades didn't die for nothing... There won't be any more ambushes thanks to them — and you!"

traits.locale_text: 「よかった。少なくとも私の仲間は無駄死にしなかったということだ。もう待ち伏せされることはないでしょう。彼らと…そして、あなたのおかげで！」

languages.text: «Bien. Eso significa que mis camaradas no murieron en vano... Gracias a ellos, y a usted, no habrá más emboscadas».
languages.original_text: "Good. That means at least my comrades didn't die for nothing... There won't be any more ambushes thanks to them — and you!"

traits.locale_text: «Bien. Eso significa que mis camaradas no murieron en vano... Gracias a ellos, y a usted, no habrá más emboscadas».

languages.text: "Güzel. En azından yoldaşlarım boşuna ölmemiş olur. Onların... Tabii ki bir de sizin sayenizde artık pusuya düşmeyeceğiz!"
languages.original_text: "Good. That means at least my comrades didn't die for nothing... There won't be any more ambushes thanks to them — and you!"

traits.locale_text: "Güzel. En azından yoldaşlarım boşuna ölmemiş olur. Onların... Tabii ki bir de sizin sayenizde artık pusuya düşmeyeceğiz!"
